hero.title: HR was never as
hero.subtitle: Revolutionize your human resources with AI-powered tools for recruitment, employee wellness, and workplace happiness assessment.

cvAnalysis.title: AI CV Analysis
cvAnalysis.description: Intelligent resume screening with detailed compatibility scoring and automated candidate evaluation.

wellness.title: Workplace Wellness
wellness.description: Anonymous employee happiness assessment based on the scientific PERMA-W model for better workplace culture.

teamManagement.title: HR Team powered
teamManagement.description: Streamlined hiring process with position management, applicant tracking, candidates database AI analyze and detailed analytics dashboard.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your HR?
cta.subtitle: Join the future of human resources with our AI-powered platform. Start optimizing your recruitment and employee wellness today.

sections.demoSubtitle: We strongly advise you to use our fake CV in the demo. If you would like to use a real one, please note that all the demo data including CVs are deleted each night at 2AM.

labels.clickToSelect: Click here to select your CV

messages.notice: Please ensure that you have your phone number and email address in your CV
messages.success: Analysis completed successfully! Your CV has been processed and saved.

score.low: Thank you for your application. Unfortunately, your resume does not sufficiently match the position. Explore our other openings.
score.medium: Your CV partially matches the position. Our HR specialist will analyse it.
score.high: Thank you for your application! Your resume is a good match. A member of HR will contact you shortly.

messages.unableToRead: Unfortunately, we are not able to read your CV. Can you try to upload a new one?
messages.generic: An error occurred while processing your request.

app.title: Workplace Well-Being Assessment
app.subtitle: for {{companyName}}
app.description: Take a few minutes to evaluate your happiness and professional well-being. This assessment is 100% anonymous and confidential.
app.noPersonalData: No personal data is collected • Only anonymous aggregated results
app.resultsIncluded: • Results will be included in {{companyName}}'s wellness insights
app.confidentiality: 💬 Confidential and anonymous conversation • Your data is not stored personally
app.aggregate: • Aggregate insights help improve {{companyName}}'s workplace wellness

welcome.default: Hello! 😊 I'm here to help you assess your workplace well-being. This evaluation is completely anonymous and confidential. We'll discuss various aspects of your work life for a few minutes. Are you ready to start?
welcome.company: Hello! 😊 I'm here to help you assess your workplace well-being at {{companyName}}. This evaluation is completely anonymous and confidential. We'll discuss various aspects of your work life for a few minutes. Are you ready to start?

progress.title: Happy Check Progress
progress.permaIntro: PERMA scores will appear as you progress through the assessment

completion.complete: Your workplace well-being assessment is now complete.
completion.excellent: Fantastic! Your workplace well-being is shining positively. Keep cultivating this great energy! 🌟
completion.good: Very good! You have solid foundations for your professional well-being. A few tweaks can make you shine even more! ✨
completion.improvable: Your situation has good potential for improvement. The tips below will help you reach new heights! 🚀
completion.poor: Thank you for your honesty. Your answers show real challenges, but remember that everything can improve with the right strategies and support. 💙
completion.adviceIntro: Based on your well-being profile, here are 3 tailored tips to help you thrive:
completion.privacyNote: Privacy: Your responses are fully anonymous and help improve overall workplace well-being.

auth.description: You must be logged in to access the HR dashboard.

errors.notAuthenticated: Not authenticated - please log in again
errors.accessDenied: Access denied - no company associated with your account

recommendations.positive: Organize team events, celebrate successes, improve recognition
recommendations.engagement: Offer challenging projects, skill development, increased autonomy
recommendations.relationships: Team building, communication training, collaboration spaces
recommendations.meaning: Clarify mission, show impact, align with personal values
recommendations.accomplishment: Clear goals, regular feedback, growth opportunities
recommendations.workLifeBalance: Flexible hours, remote work, disconnection policies

footer.privacyText: All data is fully anonymized. No personal information is stored or displayed.
